name: Steinhart-Hart

Subflow to calculate Fahrenheit temperature
from 10k thermistor resistance.

HighVspCurrAlarm
LowVspCurrAlarm
ProtectSWCG
info:
Block the message to the SWCG Relay if the filter pump
is not running at any speed.

name: ResetSWCGSwitch2
info:
Reset the SWCG switch if the OFF message has been sent from the Speed0
toggle in the Pool Status flow. In other words, turn the SWCG off if
the VSP current transducer starts reporting Speed0 (the pump
is not running).

name: ResetSWCGSwitch1
info:
Reset the SWCG switch if the scheduler or the user attempts to
turn it ON while the filter pump doesn't run.

This delay is to avoid a racing condition
between SWCG and filter pump schedulers.

name: ProtectPolarisPump
info:
Block the message to the Polaris Relay if the filter pump
doesn't run at Speed2.

name: ResetPolarisSwitch1
info:
Reset the Polaris switch if the scheduler or the user attempts to
turn it ON while the filter pump doesn't run at Speed2.

name: ResetPolarisSwitch2
info:
Reset the Polaris switch if the OFF message has been sent from
Speed2 toggle in the Pool Status flow. In other words, turn
the Polaris pump off if the VSP current transducer stops
reporting Speed2.

This delay is to avoid a racing condition
between Polaris and filter pump schedulers.

name: Color Assignment Note
info:
Delay nodes to establish colors for time series.
The time series of the first measurement to arrive
will be assigned navy blue, the second light blue,
the third orange, etc.

name: ConvertActiveCurrentToDutyCycle
